content:
Hello 6.100L Instructors!

My name is Frankie, and I'm currently in the process of becoming a TSR^2 tutor for 6.100L. I've only taken 6.100A in my freshman fall, so I haven't learned the 6.100L course content, which is why I'd like to look it over to see what students are working on. Since I'm not in the class I don't have access, so I wanted to ask if there was any way I could get access to the course material?

Thank you! :)

Frankie
subject: Accessing 6.100L Course Content

content: All set, I added you to the site.
